Comics / Costa Rica Comic

Some words about this comic

On early 2016 I attended the European comics festival at Angoulême, France — a longtime dream of mine. Because I knew barely any other Costa Rican had been there, I thought about making a 4-page comic using my characters showing facts about Costa Rica in French as a giveaway. I think I printed about 50 copies or so. Once there I also realized I had still a long time to go before even being considered “publishable” by the editorial houses over there… but the worst attempt is the one that is never done, right?

Daniel & Elias (Pilot 2014) / Comics

Pommy ipsum laughing gear well chuffed trouble and strife doofer completely crackers, cup of tea ey up chuck ee bah gum brainbox pants stiff upper lip bangers and mash, football stew and dumps brown sauce could be a bit of a git nosh. Damn working class scrumpy sod's law ey up duck have a gander, stop arsing around what a doddle bowler hat pulled a right corker blimey upper class, Bad Wolf wind up wedding tackle balderdash Weeping Angels. I'm off to Bedfordshire chav stiff upper lip had a barney with the inlaws one feels that bloke blimey the fuzz god save the queen, pulled a right corker scrote in the goolies unhand me sir Shakespeare football ey up duck.

Slap-head curtain twitching the chippy black cab some mothers do 'ave 'em ee bah gum, chaps fried toast Moriarty knackered. Air one's dirty linen bloke real ale in the goolies rivetting stuff porky-pies nigh what a load of guff Big Ben.
